original_title: Tarahumaras 2003, La fêlure du temps - La Despedida
overview: Fifth chapter of La fêlure du temps. "Yes, the dead, I see him very well. He tells me of the necessity to do that ritual. We have to end this, that he may be clean, limpiado, that he must finish all that needs to be finished."
title: Tarahumaras 2003, La fêlure du temps - La Despedida
